comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: "Frederick William Victor Augustus Ernest (German: Friedrich Wilhelm Victor August Ernst) (6 May 1882 – 20 July 1951) of the House of Hohenzollern was the last Crown Prince of the Kingdom of Prussia and the German Empire. He was colloquially known as William or Wilhelm throughout Europe." en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William,_German_Crown_Prince

comment.author: 34911459@N08
comment._content: artolog: thanks for the full name and background information.  We will update our record.
